channel.title: tools on madewhere
channel.description: Recent content in tools on madewhere

item.title: Estwing
item.description: Estwing is a tool manufacturer, specializing in hammers. A large number of their products are USA-made, with exceptions being their specialty fiberglass and plastic hammers which are made in Taiwan.

item.title: Channellock
item.description: Channellock is a tool manufacturer, probably best known for their channel-locking pliers. They offer a variety of gripping tools, made in the USA. Unfortunately not all of their products are USA-made, but those that are carry a prominent label. Those that are not do not denote their origin in an obvious manner.

item.title: Benchmade
item.description: Benchmade is an American knife manufacturer, which produces a wide range of knives in their Oregon City, OR factory. Since discontinuing their off-shore manufacturing in 2010, all of their products are USA-made.

item.title: Knipex
item.description: Knipex is a German tool manufacturer, probably best known for their pliers. They provide a wide range of gripping tools for multiple industries, as well as a line of snap-blade knives.
